product_info.name: Vamuss Black Straw Cowboy Hat for Men, Faux Leather, Longhorn, Shapeable Brim
product_info.description: Men's ultra-cool straw cowboy hat in black with shapeable brim edges. Featuring a dark nickel color Longhorn accent in front and a black 1.5 inch wide faux leather band with antique brass color studs. One size fits most up to 24 inches. Interior features an elastic interior sweatband for a snug fit. Hat includes free size reducing tape. If fit is to loose, simply apply tape to interior of hat, behind the sweatband, to reduce size. The 3.5 inch brim features hidden wire in edges which makes the hat shapeable. Adjust the brim to your favorite style. A great fashion piece. Available for a limited time only. Makes a great gift!
product_info.features:
Paper Straw




Elastic closure




Straw cowboy hat for Men fits up to apx 24 inches




Interior features elastic sweatband for a snug fit




Includes free size-adjusting tape to reduce hat size if fit is too loose




Exterior features a black faux leather band accented by metal studs and a Longhorn at front




3.5 inch wide brim edges are shapeable to get just the right look
